keyMoments.title: Franky Watches Usopp Repair the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Franky observes from a distance as Usopp desperately attempts to repair the Going Merry, commenting that the ship is beyond saving.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's growing awareness of and connection to the Straw Hats, particularly Usopp's dedication.
keyMoments.quote: That guy's trying to fix that ship... but it's a lost cause.

keyMoments.title: Franky Revealed to be Cutty Flam
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci deduces and confirms that Franky is actually Cutty Flam, one of Tom's Workers who was believed to be dead for eight years.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation exposes Franky's true identity and past, making him CP9's new target as the holder of the Pluton blueprints. This is a critical turning point for Franky's character.

keyMoments.title: Flashback: Receives Pluton Blueprints from Iceburg
keyMoments.description: In a flashback, Iceburg entrusts the Pluton blueprints to Franky four years ago, asking him to abandon his real name and leave Water 7 to protect the blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals how Franky came to possess the Pluton blueprints and explains the secret bond between him and Iceburg. Shows the trust between the two former apprentices.

reveals.information: Franky is actually Cutty Flam, one of Tom's Workers believed to have died 8 years ago
Franky possesses the real Pluton blueprints, entrusted to him by Iceburg four years ago
Iceburg asked Franky to abandon his real name 'Cutty Flam' and leave Water 7 to protect the blueprints from the World Government

relationships.description: Former fellow apprentice under Tom. Iceburg entrusted Franky with the Pluton blueprints and asked him to change his identity for protection.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback reveals Iceburg's deep trust in Franky, entrusting him with the most dangerous secret in the world.

keyMoments.title: Deduces Franky is Cutty Flam
keyMoments.description: Through careful analysis of the fake blueprints and his knowledge of Water 7's history, Lucci deduces that the supposedly dead Cutty Flam is actually still alive as Franky.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Lucci's analytical intelligence and reveals the truth about Franky's identity, making Franky CP9's next target.
keyMoments.quote: The third signature on these blueprints... Cutty Flam. That's the name of the man who tried to meet with you four years ago. The man the World Government believes is dead.

keyMoments.title: Explains CP9's True Purpose
keyMoments.description: Lucci reveals that CP9 is a secret government assassination unit with authorization to kill anyone who opposes the World Government's will 'in the name of justice.'
keyMoments.significance: Exposes CP9's true nature and the World Government's dark intentions, establishing the moral conflict of the arc.
keyMoments.quote: CP9 is a secret unit that doesn't officially exist. We have permission from the World Government to kill anyone who gets in the way of justice.

keyMoments.title: Uses Shigan on Paulie
keyMoments.description: Lucci demonstrates the Rokushiki technique 'Shigan' (Finger Gun), instantly incapacitating Paulie with a powerful finger strike.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Rokushiki techniques in the anime, establishing CP9's superhuman combat abilities.

keyMoments.title: Introduces Rokushiki
keyMoments.description: Lucci explains the concept of Rokushiki - six superhuman martial arts techniques that CP9 agents have mastered through rigorous training.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most important combat systems in One Piece, representing a non-Devil Fruit path to superhuman power.
keyMoments.quote: We've trained our bodies beyond human limits. These techniques are called Rokushiki - the Six Powers.

keyMoments.title: Uses Tekkai to Block Luffy's Attack
keyMoments.description: Lucci uses 'Tekkai' (Iron Body) to harden his body and completely nullify damage from Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Gatling.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates another Rokushiki technique and shows that Luffy's standard attacks are ineffective against CP9.

keyMoments.title: Uses Shigan on Luffy
keyMoments.description: Lucci strikes Luffy's neck with Shigan. The attack would have been instantly fatal if not for Luffy's rubber body.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the lethal nature of Shigan and demonstrates that even Luffy is vulnerable to CP9's techniques.
keyMoments.quote: If you weren't made of rubber, that would have killed you instantly.

abilities.description: A powerful finger thrust technique that can pierce through human bodies like a bullet.
A defensive technique that hardens the user's body to the strength of iron, allowing them to withstand powerful attacks.

reveals.information: Member of CP9, a secret World Government assassination unit
Master of Rokushiki, six superhuman martial arts techniques

keyMoments.title: Declares She's Leaving the Crew
keyMoments.description: Robin shocks the Straw Hat Pirates by declaring that she's leaving the crew, stating that her dream can never be achieved while staying with them.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most emotionally devastating moments in the Water 7 Arc. Robin's apparent betrayal breaks the crew's hearts and sets up the rescue mission to Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.quote: I'm leaving this crew. The dream I would sacrifice anything for can never be achieved with you.

keyMoments.title: Attacks to Prevent Interference
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi powers to restrain the Straw Hats and prevent them from interfering with CP9's escape.
keyMoments.significance: Robin actively working against her former crewmates reinforces the appearance of her betrayal, making the situation even more heartbreaking.

reveals.information: Robin declares she is leaving the Straw Hat Pirates to pursue her dream

relationships.description: Robin's departure from the Straw Hat Pirates creates a major crisis in her relationship with Luffy and the crew.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin declares she's leaving the crew, creating a rift that will define the rest of the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs.

keyMoments.title: Breaks Into Iceburg's Room
keyMoments.description: Luffy crashes through the walls with Zoro, Nami, Chopper, and Paulie to reach Iceburg's bedroom, finding CP9 and the wounded Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of direct confrontation between the Straw Hats and CP9.

keyMoments.title: Hit by Lucci's Shigan
keyMoments.description: Luffy attacks Lucci with Gomu Gomu no Gatling, but Lucci blocks it with Tekkai and counterattacks with Shigan to Luffy's neck. Only Luffy's rubber body prevents instant death.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even Luffy is vulnerable to CP9's techniques and establishes the power gap between them.

keyMoments.title: Refuses to Accept Robin's Departure
keyMoments.description: When Zoro asks if he's going to accept Robin leaving, Luffy firmly refuses, making it clear he won't let her go without a fight.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Luffy's unwavering loyalty to his crew members and sets up the Enies Lobby rescue arc.

keyMoments.title: Pulse Reveals the Truth
keyMoments.description: Kaku reads Iceburg's pulse as Lucci presents his theory, and the elevated heart rate when hearing about Cutty Flam confirms the truth.
keyMoments.significance: Iceburg's involuntary physical response confirms that Franky is indeed Cutty Flam and possesses the blueprints.

keyMoments.title: Flashback: Entrusts Blueprints to Franky
keyMoments.description: In a flashback, Iceburg gives the Pluton blueprints to Franky four years ago and asks him to abandon his real name and leave Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the secret bond between Iceburg and Franky and explains how Franky came to possess the blueprints.
keyMoments.quote: Take these blueprints and leave Water 7. Don't use your real name anymore. From now on, you're just Franky.

reveals.information: Iceburg entrusted the real Pluton blueprints to Franky (Cutty Flam) four years ago

relationships.description: Former fellow apprentice under Tom. Iceburg entrusted Franky with the Pluton blueprints.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback reveals the deep trust between Iceburg and Franky when Iceburg entrusts him with the world's most dangerous secret.

keyMoments.title: Verifies Truth Through Pulse Reading
keyMoments.description: Kaku uses his Rokushiki training to read Iceburg's pulse and heartbeat, confirming that Lucci's theory about Franky being Cutty Flam is true.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates CP9's investigative abilities and confirms Franky as their next target.
keyMoments.quote: His pulse just spiked. What you said is true.

reveals.information: Revealed as a member of CP9

keyMoments.title: Breaks Into Iceburg's Room
keyMoments.description: Paulie crashes through the walls with the Straw Hats to reach Iceburg's bedroom and confront CP9.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Paulie's determination to save Iceburg and his willingness to work with the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: Iceburg! What did you do to him?!

keyMoments.title: Hit by Lucci's Shigan
keyMoments.description: Paulie attacks CP9 but is instantly incapacitated by Rob Lucci's Shigan technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the lethal power of Rokushiki and the vast gap between CP9's abilities and ordinary fighters.
